result.title: DOP
result.description: The Design Option Paper will explore a methodology that will guide the innovation agencies to assess SMEs IP and data management needs and propose valuable solutions casebased It will consist of a set of practical guidelines manuals and templates designed to be easily used and taken up by companies This will allow supported SMEs technology providers and researchers to overcome the fear and barriers related to IP and knowledge sharing issues and to capture the value of a Digital IP portfolio thus contributing to unlocking the full potential of digitalization The use of the designed methodology will impact the capacity of innovation agencies to manage innovation and technology transfer processes including knowledge sharing joint collaboration and open innovation

result.title: Communication and Dissemination Strategy M24
result.description: This series of deliverables will describe the dissemination and collaboration strategy and the activities followed during the reporting periods as well as the results from these activities see Section 223 for a detailed description of the planned dissemination strategy for PolicyCLOUD An internal plan will be developed in M6 to drive the initial dissemination activities of the project A policy brief will be added as an annex in all versions of the report The updated Communication and Dissemination Strategy will be provided in M36 respectivelly

result.title: Data Management Plan M12
result.description: PolicyCLOUD will participate in the Pilot on Open Research Data in H2020 and will endeavour to offer open access to its scientific results reported in publications to the relevant scientific data and to data generated during the course of the project The plan will identify the best practices and specific standards for the generated data and assess their suitability for sharing and reuse in accordance with official guidelines see Section 226 Deliverable updates will be provided by M24 and M36

result.title: Cloud Infrastructure Incentives Management and Data Governance: Design and Open Specification 2
result.description: This report will provide the second version of the design of the cloud gateways and the cloud provisioning approaches to ensure utilization of cloud resources as required for the PolicyCLOUD environment It will also provide the algorithms implementing the incentives management as well as the data governance model and the specification of the tools used to ensure compliance to the model across the complete data path
